# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a tensor with extents from an array of dimension values.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init?(_ values: [Int])
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for ensuring the array contains at most `MTL_TENSOR_MAX_RANK` (`16`) elements.
title: init(_:)
